segments.text: Sorry , I don't know , there's something wrong with my watch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You've simply forgotten to wind it up , have you ? When do you usually wind it up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In the coming , before going to work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You got up so late today . You have , I think . Turn on the TV and set your watch by it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . It's just four o'clock .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm setting my watch at four . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
